Public Class methods

new(proxy_scope, options, &block)

[Source]

     # File vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/named_scope.rb, line 113
113:       def initialize(proxy_scope, options, &block)
114:         [options[:extend]].flatten.each { |extension| extend extension } if options[:extend]
115:         extend Module.new(&block) if block_given?
116:         @proxy_scope, @proxy_options = proxy_scope, options.except(:extend)
117:       end

Public Instance methods

any?() {|*block_args| ...}

[Source]

     # File vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/named_scope.rb, line 151
151:       def any?
152:         if block_given?
153:           proxy_found.any? { |*block_args| yield(*block_args) }
154:         else
155:           !empty?
156:         end
157:       end
empty?()

[Source]

     # File vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/named_scope.rb, line 143
143:       def empty?
144:         @found ? @found.empty? : count.zero?
145:       end
first(*args)

[Source]

     # File vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/named_scope.rb, line 123
123:       def first(*args)
124:         if args.first.kind_of?(Integer) || (@found && !args.first.kind_of?(Hash))
125:           proxy_found.first(*args)
126:         else
127:           find(:first, *args)
128:         end
129:       end

131:       def last(*args)
132:         if args.first.kind_of?(Integer) || (@found && !args.first.kind_of?(Hash))
133:           proxy_found.last(*args)
134:         else
135:           find(:last, *args)
136:         end
137:       end

119:       def reload

respond_to?(method, include_private = false)

[Source]

     # File vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/named_scope.rb, line 147
147:       def respond_to?(method, include_private = false)
148:         super || @proxy_scope.respond_to?(method, include_private)
149:       end
